home.summary: Software Engineering student at 42 Madrid üíª. I consider myself a proactive person, with a great work ethic and good social skills. I specialize in full stack application development.

projects.name: Ft_IRC
projects.summary: IRC server implementation following the IRC protocol. Supports multiple clients, channels, and operator commands.

projects.name: Inception
projects.summary: Set up a small-medium infrastructure using Docker and Docker Compose.

projects.name: TFG Desarrollo de Aplicaciones Multiplataforma
projects.summary: Development of a native Android mobile application (Kotlin) supported by a Spring Boot and MySQL backend, designed to optimize healthcare management.

projects.name: minishell
projects.summary: Recreating a shell in C using bash as a reference.

projects.name: so_long
projects.summary: A 2D game where a player must collect all items and escape through the exit.

projects.name: Philosophers
projects.summary: C implementation of Dining Philosophers focusing on synchronization and deadlock avoidance.

bio: Hi, I'm Victor from Madrid, Spain. I've been coding since 2020. In this year, I started programming making video games in C# with Unity accepted into 42 School, where I learned a variety of technologies and foundational software development principles.
When I'm not at my desk, you'll probably find me in the gym lifting weights, playing some sports, or riding my bike üèãÔ∏è
about.work_intro: Here are some of the places I have worked.
about.education_intro: Right now I'm focused on completing Software Engineering at 42 Madrid.
